reference_a:
@article{fried2022,
  title = {Mental health and social contact during the {{COVID-19}} pandemic: an ecological momentary assessment study},
  shorttitle = {Mental health and social contact during the {{COVID-19}} pandemic},
  author = {Fried, Eiko I. and Papanikolaou, Faidra and Epskamp, Sacha},
  date = {2022-03-01},
  journaltitle = {Clinical Psychological Science},
  volume = {10},
  number = {2},
  pages = {340--354},
  publisher = {SAGE Publications Inc},
  doi = {10.1177/21677026211017839}
}
additional_comments: some individuals have more than the maximum number of observations due to some prompts being expired

features.name: id
features.description: Participant ID

features.name: scheduled
features.description: Time of beep schedule

features.name: issued
features.description: Time of beep issue

features.name: response
features.description: Time of response

features.name: duration
features.description: Duration of response

features.name: relax
features.description: I found it difficult to relax.
features.coding:
1 = Not at all 
2 = Slightly
3 = Moderately
4 = Very
5 = Extremly

features.name: irritable
features.description: I felt (very) irritable
features.coding:
1 = Not at all 
2 = Slightly
3 = Moderately
4 = Very
5 = Extremly

features.name: worry
features.description: I was worried about different things
features.coding:
1 = Not at all 
2 = Slightly
3 = Moderately
4 = Very
5 = Extremly

features.name: nervous
features.description: I felt nervous, anxious or on edge
features.coding:
1 = Not at all 
2 = Slightly
3 = Moderately
4 = Very
5 = Extremly

features.name: future
features.description: I I felt that I had nothing to look forward
features.coding:
1 = Not at all 
2 = Slightly
3 = Moderately
4 = Very
5 = Extremly

features.name: anhedonia
features.description: I couldn't seem to experience any positive feeling at all
features.coding:
1 = Not at all 
2 = Slightly
3 = Moderately
4 = Very
5 = Extremly

features.name: tired
features.description: I felt tired
features.coding:
1 = Not at all 
2 = Slightly
3 = Moderately
4 = Very
5 = Extremly

features.name: hungry
features.description: In the past 3h, I was hungry
features.coding:
1 = Not at all 
2 = Slightly
3 = Moderately
4 = Very
5 = Extremly

features.name: alone
features.description: I felt like I lack companionship, or that I am not close to people.
features.coding:
1 = Not at all 
2 = Slightly
3 = Moderately
4 = Very
5 = Extremly

features.name: angry
features.description: I felt angry
features.coding:
1 = Not at all 
2 = Slightly
3 = Moderately
4 = Very
5 = Extremly

features.name: social_offline
features.description: I spent ___ minutes on meaningful, offline, social interaction

features.name: social_online
features.description: I spent __ minutes using social media to kill/pass the time

features.name: music
features.description: I spent __ minutes listening to music

features.name: procrastinate
features.description: Procastination
features.coding:
To what degree did you postpone working on a task?

1 = 0 minutes
2 = 5-15 min
3 = 15-60 min
4 = 1-2 hours
5 = > 2h

features.name: outdoors
features.description: I spent __ minutes outside (outdoors) ?

features.name: c19_occupied
features.description: I spent __ occupied with the coronavirus (e.g. watching news thinking about it talking to friends about it)

features.name: c19_worry
features.description: I spent __ thinking about my own health or that of my close friends and family members regarding the coronavirus

features.name: home
features.description: I spent __ at home (including the home of parents/partner)

features.name: day
features.description: Day of study

features.name: beep
features.description: Beep of the day

features.name: date
features.description: Date
